root: ^Even if it is a dream... isn't it kinda crazy?
^I guess I have to introduce myself...
^I am one of the so called "Grim Reapers".
^And don't even ask, we don't have much time right now to answer all of your questions.
^But I will tell you one thing.
^If a simple human can see a Grim Reaper, then his life is coming to an end.
^And I know she would try to hide that...
^But that girl you recently talked to is also one of us.
^She is obsessed with an idea, that people in this state like yours can be saved.
^I know her for a long time.
^She tried to save a lot of people... But she never succeeded.
^I don't want to see how a soul is tormented with false hopes.
^Show me, that you have the will to live, even for not a long time.
^But if you fail... You don't have to worry about that.
^That is absolutely normal. I will bring you an instant, painless ending and send your soul to the cycle.
^I think now it is time for you to start your trial.
^Go ahead. I will watch you from the shadows...
